name: .MGCB File Extension
summary: Learn about .MGCB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Technical illustration created by Equation Illustrator, a program used to draw equations and diagrams; contains text, symbols, and vector graphics; commonly used for mathematical formulas or equations, as well as some technical diagrams.

content: Equation Illustrator can export MGCB files to .BMP, .JPG, .GIF, .PNG, .EMF, and .WMF formats.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
